医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
心率变异性降低与糖尿病患者死亡率升高相关根据将于今年欧洲糖尿病协会年会上公布的新研究，每日心率 (HR) 正常变化的破坏与 21 年内患有 1 型和 2 型糖尿病的患者的死亡风险显着增加相关。糖尿病研究 (EASD)，马德里（9 月 9 日至 13 日）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Reduced-heart-rate-variability-linked-to-higher-mortality-in-people-with-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Reduced-heart-rate-variability-linked-to-higher-mortality-in-people-with-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2692e7c-8955-4843-90ba-61753b8bd2aa Mon, 09 Sep 2024 22:40:13 -0400 Reduced heart rate variability linked to higher mortality in people with diabetes
人工神经网络可以通过分析睡眠呼吸模式来识别早产儿的肺部疾病根据在奥地利维也纳举行的欧洲呼吸学会 (ERS) 大会上发表的研究，可以训练人工神经网络 (ANN) 通过分析早产儿睡眠时的呼吸模式来检测早产儿的肺部疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/ANNs-can-identify-lung-disease-in-preterm-infants-by-analyzing-sleep-breathing-patterns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/ANNs-can-identify-lung-disease-in-preterm-infants-by-analyzing-sleep-breathing-patterns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6669813-10f8-487b-8638-14414634de22 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 22:35:20 -0400 ANNs can identify lung disease in preterm infants by analyzing sleep breathing patterns
研究显示哮喘与 2 型糖尿病之间存在相互关系根据在马德里举行的欧洲糖尿病研究协会 (EASD) 年会上对 1700 万人的数据进行的分析，2 型糖尿病 (T2D) 患者更有可能患上哮喘，反之亦然，西班牙（9 月 9 日至 13 日）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Study-shows-reciprocal-relationship- Between-asthma-and-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Study-shows-reciprocal-relationship- Between-asthma-and-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f57859d-6aeb-4f65-ad05-f88a30871726 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 22:31:04 -0400 Study shows reciprocal relationship between asthma and type 2 diabetes
SP-101基因疗法显示出治疗囊性纤维化的希望Spirovant Sciences 的科学家在同行评审期刊《人类基因治疗》中描述了 SP-101，这是一种用于治疗囊性纤维化 (CF) 的新型腺相关病毒 (AAV) 基因疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/SP-101-gene-therapy-shows-promise-for-cystic-太多纤维化-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/SP-101-gene-therapy-shows-promise-for-cystic-太多纤维化-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a986e180-8f5f-4249-9ab6-589bb7be29b6 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 21:52:58 -0400 SP-101 gene therapy shows promise for cystic fibrosis treatment
GLP-1 受体激动剂在治疗物质使用障碍方面显示出前景一项系统评价表明，GLP-1 受体激动剂可能有助于减少某些物质使用障碍，但由于研究差异和患者差异，结果并不一致。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/GLP-1-receptor-agonists-show-promise-in-treating-substance-use-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/GLP-1-receptor-agonists-show-promise-in-treating-substance-use-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c4594f5-c551-436c-865b-b96d37cefd7e Mon, 09 Sep 2024 18:51:00 -0400 GLP-1 receptor agonists show promise in treating substance use disorders
研究显示科罗拉多州限制价格后胰岛素成本大幅下降糖尿病影响着数百万美国人，每年诊断出 140 万新病例。这种慢性病是美国的主要原因之一，每年造成的医疗费用超过 3200 亿美元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Study-shows-significant-drop-in-insulin-costs-after-colorado-caps-prices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Study-shows-significant-drop-in-insulin-costs-after-colorado-caps-prices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3877a35b-035d-4a10-a725-e15b9c9a7333 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 15:56:00 -0400 Study shows significant drop in insulin costs after Colorado caps prices
研究证实携带 BRCA 突变的乳腺癌幸存者母乳喂养是安全的根据在 2024 年 ESMO 大会上发表的两项国际研究，接受乳腺癌治疗后进行母乳喂养的女性，包括那些患有种系 BRCA 突变（BRCA 基因的遗传性变化，会显着增加患某些癌症，尤其是乳腺癌）的女性，不会面临复发或发展新乳腺癌的风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Research-confirms-safety-of-breastfeeding-for-breast-cancer-survivors-with-BRCA-mutations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Research-confirms-safety-of-breastfeeding-for-breast-cancer-survivors-with-BRCA-mutations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9114efd-a8cd-49fd-bb9c-f60b3e87447e Mon, 09 Sep 2024 15:50:32 -0400 Research confirms safety of breastfeeding for breast cancer survivors with BRCA mutations
无细胞 RNA 分析增强了儿科炎症的早期检测RNA 通过细胞死亡或主动释放从细胞中排出，然后进入血浆。康奈尔大学领导的一项合作开发了机器学习模型，利用这些无细胞分子 RNA 残渣来诊断难以区分的儿科炎​​症状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Cell-free-RNA-analysis-enhances-early-detection-of-pediatric-lingual-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Cell-free-RNA-analysis-enhances-early-detection-of-pediatric-lingual-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83611f7a-7ea0-4c53-adf5-01bfe8e43ad6 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 15:40:07 -0400 Cell-free RNA analysis enhances early detection of pediatric inflammatory conditions
研究发现，大流行加速青少年大脑成熟在 COVID-19 大流行期间，世界各国政府实施了限制性措施 -；例如居家令和学校停课；以减轻呼吸道疾病的传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Pandemic-accelerates-brain-maturation-in-adolescents-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Pandemic-accelerates-brain-maturation-in-adolescents-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cff1f2cc-6822-4af7-9472-4e5b49c12277 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 15:31:06 -0400 Pandemic accelerates brain maturation in adolescents, study finds
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：来自奥斯汀的现场直播，审视健康公平“健康公平”一词对不同的人有不同的含义。这关系到获得医疗保健的机会，但不仅仅是获得医疗保健的机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/KFF-Health-News-What-The-Health-Live-from-Austin-examining-health-equity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/KFF-Health-News-What-The-Health-Live-from-Austin-examining-health-equity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1a06b6a-6000-4194-a80a-c275da0ce704 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 15:19:00 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': Live from Austin, examining health equity
